name: Faery Tale Adventure 2: The Halls of the Dead
name_original: Faery Tale Adventure 2: The Halls of the Dead
description:
Faery Tale Adventure 2: The Halls of the Dead is a RPG game developed by Dreamers' Guild, The. It came out on 01-01-1997. It was published by Trimark Interactive. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Faery Tale Adventure 2: The Halls of the Dead on PC.
